head.title: Books Worth a Spot On a Car Buff's Shelf

hedline.hl1: Books Worth a Spot On a Car Buff's Shelf

block.p: In any field, there are certain books that are essential. Some are handy references, others provide the perspective of history and still others are simply good reads.
Here is a selection of books that will make a fine foundation for an automotive library. All are widely available either new or used.
